tool_description: Manages content versioning, tracks changes, and provides rollback capabilities for course materials and assessments.

content_id.description: Identifier of the content to version

content_type.description: Type of content: lesson, assessment, media, course_structure

version_description.description: Description of changes made in this version

author_id.description: Identifier of the person making changes

change_type.description: Type of change: create, update, delete, restore

error_messages: Invalid content_id: Specified content does not exist.
Invalid content_type: Use lesson, assessment, media, or course_structure.
Invalid change_type: Use create, update, delete, or restore.
Version description required: Provide a meaningful description of changes.
Authorization failed: Author does not have permission to modify this content.
usage: Provide content_id, content_type, version_description, author_id, and change_type to create a version checkpoint for content changes.
